start:
You are a poor farmer who spends every day struggling to make enough money to eat.
All the food you grow has to be sold to keep your home.

The world has now been overtaken by mutated plants.
They've evolved to wrap around houses and destroy everything inside.
The plants are nearly indestructible as nothing is powerful enough to destroy them.
If this continues, humanity might come to an end.

This is your chance.  Make a change in your life and become a sucessful hero.
Give your life a meaning.  

Fight the plants, and save the world.
